availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George S. Low (Owen County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, resident. Maine native. Married to Kate Low. Resident in Owen County, Kentucky in 1860. Master commissioner for Owen County Circuit Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 226.
KYR-0001-004-0318
Find A Grave, "George Low (1830-1908)," Memorial #25498380, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25498380 (accessed June 16, 2020).
